com.myscript.atk.scw

Interface SingleCharWidgetApi.OnTextChangedListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SingleCharWidgetApi

    public static interface SingleCharWidgetApi.OnTextChangedListener
    Called when the text changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTextChanged(SingleCharWidgetApi w, String text, boolean intermediate)
      Called when the text changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onTextChanged

        void onTextChanged(SingleCharWidgetApi w,
                   String text,
                   boolean intermediate)
        Called when the text changes. The text returned by this callback may be intermediate, which means that it can change again in the near future. Text is intermediate as long as the widget contains ink, because the handwriting engine can change the interpretation of the text as more strokes are appended.

        Ink is eventually cleared and turned into characters during the freeze process, which happens after the ink has been committed. If auto-commit is enabled, this process happens automatically after the auto-commit delay in superimposed mode or after auto-commit + auto-freeze delays in other modes.

        Text will remain intermediate if auto-commit is disabled. You should manually call the commit method to trigger a commit operation in this case.

        Parameters:
        w - Widget for which text changes.
        text - String representation of the text.
        intermediate - true if the text is an intermediate handwriting recognition result, false if the text is stable.
        See Also:
        SingleCharWidgetApi.setAutoCommitEnabled(boolean), SingleCharWidgetApi.setAutoCommitDelay(int), SingleCharWidgetApi.setAutoFreezeDelay(int), SingleCharWidgetApi.commit(boolean)
